constituent: abdomen, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, fold back, double back, reclining, lying down, sun, day, walking legs
heisigStory: If you double back (fold over) most animals - or people, for that matter - in the middle, the part of the body where the crease comes is the abdomen.
koohiiStory1: The only body part that doubles over.
koohiiStory2: Imagine getting punched in the abdomen, a fairly tender part of flesh, and instead of doubling forward, you double back. That would be pretty painful.
myStory: chữ Phúc. bụng, tấm lòng, đùm bọc . khoang bụng. bộ phận cả ngày đến muộn. chữ nguyệt và chữ phúc.
